channel.title: July One-Shots: The Final Girl
channel.description:
**July One-Shots**: The Final Girl
**When**: Thursday 7/1/2021, 8:00 PM EDT
**Sessions**: 1
**Players**: 4 (including the facilitator)
**Content Warnings**: Graphic violence, death, possibly other themes that will be hashed out during game set-up.
---- *The Final Girl* is a GM-less horror movie role-playing game meant to emulate slasher flicks or other horror movies where the characters are picked off one-by-one until only one survivor remains to confront the killer. We will create our own movie and find out who will survive to see the end credits.
---- **Technology**: The GM's Zoom for video chat, Google Sheets for the character keeper, and playingcards.io for a shared virtual card table. **Safety Tools**: X-Card, Lines & Veils, Open Door **RSVP Open Access**: 6/22/2021, 8:00 PM EDT **Recording**: If all participants consent, the session will be recorded and video (or audio-only if preferred) will be uploaded to YouTube. **Experience Required**: None. All rules will be taught at the table.
[July One-Shot: The Final Girl](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-McHgFGW55TVVt6C8oT5)
